Description:
Detects usage of SoftPerfect's "netscan.exe". An application for scanning networks.
It is actively used in-the-wild by threat actors to inspect and understand the network architecture of a victim.


Author: @d4ns4n_ (Wuerth-Phoenix)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: PUA - SoftPerfect Netscan Execution
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where process_path like '%\netscan.exe' and product = 'network scanner' and description = 'application for scanning networks'
